data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="iPlanetAMPolicyConfigService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="amPolicyConfig"  i18nKey="iplanet-am-policy-config-service-description"  resourceName="policyconfiguration"  revisionNumber="60"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/iPlanetAMPolicyConfigService"  serviceVersion="6d37f397-3c5e-4e9e-a6d0-249e91558583" >
            <Global hideConfigUI="no"  validate="yes" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serviceObjectClasses"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>iplanet-am-policy-config-service</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a100"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-resource-comparator"  order="100"  resourceName="resourceComparators"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="ResourceComparatorValidator" >
		            <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>serviceType=iPlanetAMWebAgentService|class=com.sun.identity.policy.plugins.HttpURLResourceName|wildcard=*|oneLevelWildcard=-*-|delimiter=/|caseSensitive=false</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a100a"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-continue-evaluation-on-deny-decision"  order="200"  resourceName="continueEvaluationOnDeny"  syntax="boolean"  type="single"  uitype="radio" >
		    <BooleanValues>
			<BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="a100b" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
			<BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="a100c" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
		    </BooleanValues>
		    <DefaultValues>
			<Value>false</Value>
		    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a100e"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="sun-am-policy-config-org-alias-mapped-resources-enabled"  order="300"  resourceName="realmAliasReferrals"  syntax="boolean"  type="single"  uitype="radio" >
		    <BooleanValues>
			<BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="a100b" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
			<BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="a100c" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
		    </BooleanValues>
		    <DefaultValues>
			<Value>false</Value>
		    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="sun-am-policy-config-advices-handleable-by-am"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
		    <DefaultValues>
			<Value>AuthLevelConditionAdvice</Value>
			<Value>AuthSchemeConditionAdvice</Value>
			<Value>AuthenticateToRealmConditionAdvice</Value>
			<Value>AuthenticateToServiceConditionAdvice</Value>
		    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
		<AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="ResourceComparatorValidator"  syntax="string"  type="validator" >
                    <DefaultValues>
			<Value>com.sun.identity.policy.ResourceComparatorValidator</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
            </Global>

            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a101"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-server"  order="400"  resourceName="ldapServer"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
		    <DefaultValues>
			<Value>userstore-0.userstore:1389</Value>
		    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-base-dn"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>ou=identities</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a1021"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-users-base-dn"  order="500"  resourceName="usersBaseDn"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a103"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-bind-dn"  order="700"  resourceName="bindDn"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>

		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a105"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-organizations-search-filter"  order="900"  resourceName="realmSearchFilter"  syntax="xml"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-organizations-search-scope"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
		    <ChoiceValues>

                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a128" >SCOPE_SUB</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-groups-search-filter"  syntax="xml"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>(objectclass=groupOfUniqueNames)</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-groups-search-scope"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
		    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a126" >SCOPE_BASE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a127" >SCOPE_ONE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a128" >SCOPE_SUB</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
		    <DefaultValues>

		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a109"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-users-search-filter"  order="1000"  resourceName="usersSearchFilter"  syntax="xml"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>(objectclass=inetorgperson)</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a110"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-users-search-scope"  order="1100"  resourceName="usersSearchScope"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
		    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a126" >SCOPE_BASE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a127" >SCOPE_ONE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a128" >SCOPE_SUB</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
		    <DefaultValues>

		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-roles-search-filter"  syntax="xml"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>(&(objectclass=ldapsubentry)(objectclass=nsroledefinition))</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-roles-search-scope"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
		    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a126" >SCOPE_BASE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a127" >SCOPE_ONE</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a128" >SCOPE_SUB</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
		    <DefaultValues>

                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-organizations-search-attribute"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>o</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-groups-search-attribute"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>cn</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a115"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-users-search-attribute"  order="1300"  resourceName="usersSearchAttribute"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>uid</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-roles-search-attribute"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>cn</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a117"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-search-limit"  order="1400"  resourceName="maximumSearchResults"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>100</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a118"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-search-timeout"  order="1500"  resourceName="searchTimeout"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>5</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a119"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-ldap-ssl-enabled"  order="1600"  resourceName="sslEnabled"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
		    <DefaultValues>

		    </DefaultValues>
		</AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a120"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-connection_pool_min_size"  order="1700"  resourceName="connectionPoolMinimumSize"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>1</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a121"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-connection_pool_max_size"  order="1800"  resourceName="connectionPoolMaximumSize"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>10</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a152"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-policy-config-heartbeat-interval"  order="1840"  resourceName="policyHeartbeatInterval"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>10</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a153"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openam-policy-config-heartbeat-timeunit"  order="1850"  resourceName="policyHeartbeatTimeUnit"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="heartbeat.second" >SECONDS</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="heartbeat.minute" >MINUTES</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="heartbeat.hour" >HOURS</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>SECONDS</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-selected-subjects"  syntax="string"  type="multiple_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a144" >WebServicesClients</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a129" >Organization</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a130" >IdentityServerRoles</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a131" >LDAPGroups</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a132" >LDAPRoles</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a133" >LDAPUsers</ChoiceValue>
			            <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a143" >AuthenticatedUsers</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a145" >AMIdentitySubject</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>WebServicesClients</Value>
			            <Value>AuthenticatedUsers</Value>
                        <Value>AMIdentitySubject</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-selected-conditions"  syntax="string"  type="multiple_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a134" >AuthLevelCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a134a" >LEAuthLevelCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a135" >AuthSchemeCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a135a" >AuthenticateToRealmCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a135b" >AuthenticateToServiceCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a136" >IPCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a137" >SimpleTimeCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a141" >SessionCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a141a" >SessionPropertyCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a141fc" >LDAPFilterCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a141amc" >AMIdentityMembershipCondition</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a151" >ResourceEnvIPCondition</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>AuthLevelCondition</Value>
                        <Value>LEAuthLevelCondition</Value>
                        <Value>AuthSchemeCondition</Value>
                        <Value>AuthenticateToRealmCondition</Value>
                        <Value>AuthenticateToServiceCondition</Value>
                        <Value>SimpleTimeCondition</Value> 
                        <Value>IPCondition</Value>
                        <Value>SessionCondition</Value>
                        <Value>SessionPropertyCondition</Value>
                        <Value>LDAPFilterCondition</Value>
                        <Value>AMIdentityMembershipCondition</Value>
                        <Value>ResourceEnvIPCondition</Value>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="sun-am-policy-selected-responseproviders"  syntax="string"  type="multiple_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="sun-am-policy-dynamic-response-attributes"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
                    <DefaultValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-selected-referrals"  syntax="string"  type="multiple_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a138" >PeerOrgReferral</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="a139" >SubOrgReferral</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>PeerOrgReferral</Value>
                        <Value>SubOrgReferral</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a125"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-subjects-result-ttl"  order="1900"  resourceName="subjectsResultTTL"  syntax="number"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>

                    </DefaultValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a150"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-policy-config-user-alias-enabled"  order="2000"  resourceName="userAliasEnabled"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>

                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a217"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="checkIfResourceTypeExists"  order="2100"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                    <BooleanValues>
                        <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nTrue" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                        <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nFalse" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                    </BooleanValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>true</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
	    </Organization>
	</Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
